entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text:
@Liz_Wheeler @prettyjanice888 @GavinNewsom Coronavirus is highly contagious and kills at a much higher rate than the standard flu. 

You are a spreader of dangerous public health misinformation during a pandemic. 

What you’re doing will cost people lives and should be criminally negligent. 

#CoronavirusPandemic
